mapper.select: SELECT empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno FROM emp
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp ( empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno ) VALUES ( #{empno}, #{ename}, #{job}, #{mgr}, SYSDATE, #{sal}, #{comm}, #{deptno} )
mapper.update: UPDATE emp SET ename = #{ename}, job = #{job}, mgr = #{mgr}, hiredate = SYSDATE, sal = #{sal}, comm = #{comm}, deptno = #{deptno} WHERE empno = #{empno}
